description: Episode of Series "Challenge for change/Societe nouvelle". Saul Alinsky, controversial professional organiser, goes to war against the conditions that keep the poor in poverty. The film shows how he helped Black ghettos in the United States find an effective, non-violent method of fighting for their rights. (Awards: New York; Columbus.)
